name: BASquare
description:
BASquare is a software development company offering both integrated and outsourced solutions and services. In our team we have over 10 years experienced developers for Windows, Mac OS X, iOS, and Android platforms as well as for web-oriented applications. Our goal is to provide quality products for both our partners and end-users. Company was founded in 2013, as a result of merging with another developer team. Company is located in Poland, EU, with most of R&D based in Ukraine, Lviv.
 Our developers have a large experience in creating various applications for desktop, web and mobile platforms. Rich experience in creating Client-Server applications and various cross-platform solutions. Our teams work in conjunctions to create iOS applications and ASP.NET server side. Our technology stack: • Objective-C • iOS • Android • PHP • Java • C++ • ASP.NET • HTML • CSS • COCOA • MVC • JQuery • Angular.JS • MSSQL Server • MFC
